title: Transform your data workflows with Data Platform
description_top: Improve your data operations with our high-performance, flexible, and user-friendly platform. Whether you process high volumes of data, integrate analytics, or automate workflows, Data Platform offers a fully managed environment that allows you to focus on leveraging insights rather than managing the infrastructure. Its real-time processing, support for varied workloads, and effortless scalability enable organisations to make data-driven decisions faster and more efficiently.
description_bottom: No specialised infrastructure or in-depth technical expertise is required. Benefit from scalable data tools, seamless BI integrations, and a robust serverless environment to build insights faster than ever.
card_left_description:
Discover the capabilities of our secure and serverless data processing platform, designed for developers and analysts. Learn how to connect, transform, and analyse your data with ease.
Learn the basics quickly, from connecting your first data source to your first analysis. Perfect for new users!
card_middle_title: Develop your skills on Data Platform
card_middle_description: Boost your skills with advanced techniques, practical examples, and proven best practices to unlock the full potential of the Data Platform and establish your expertise.
card_right_description: Find in-depth information on all Data Platform features, supported data types, system requirements, and configurable settings.
discoveryMode: You are currently in Discovery mode. To access the Data Platform and create services, you need to activate your project.
